NAME.MIN_LENGTH: Name must be at least 3 characters long
NAME.MAX_LENGTH: Name must be at most 20 characters long

DESCRIPTION.MIN_LENGTH: Description must be at least 3 characters long
DESCRIPTION.MAX_LENGTH: Description must be at most 20 characters long

IMAGE.MIN_LENGTH: Image must be at least 3 characters long
IMAGE.MAX_LENGTH: Image must be at most 20 characters long
